en.resetAppConfirmDesc: This will delete all your data and return you to the welcome screen. You can choose a different tracking mode.
en.appResetSuccess: All data has been cleared. Welcome back!
en.welcomeDescription: Let's start tracking your special journey
en.selectTrackingMode: What would you like to track?
en.lastPeriodStart: First day of your last period
en.periodDurationHint: How many days your period typically lasts
en.fertileWindowMessage: This is the best time to conceive if you're planning pregnancy
en.weeklyInfoDescription: Your weekly pregnancy information will appear here once your pregnancy progresses.
en.daysUntilBaby: days until you meet your baby
en.moreInformation: More information about your pregnancy journey and tips will appear here as you progress through each week.
en.weeklyNotificationsDesc: Get notified when you complete a week (9 AM every week)
en.dailyTipsNotificationsDesc: Get daily pregnancy tips (8 AM every day)
en.updatePregnancyDates: Change your pregnancy tracking information or start fresh with a new pregnancy.
en.communityDescription: Ask questions, share experiences, and connect with other expecting mothers
en.communityPlaceholder: What would you like to ask or share with the community?
en.firebaseSetupNotice: To enable real-time community features, please provide your Firebase configuration. The community currently works with local data.
en.postSharedDescription: Your question has been posted to the community.
en.filesSkippedDescription: Only images and videos under 10MB are allowed.
en.hijriCalendarFeature: Hijri calendar conversion feature will be available soon
en.periodNotificationsDesc: Get notified 2 days before your expected period (9 AM)
en.monthCalculationDescription: Pregnancy months are calculated based on pregnancy weeks:
en.notificationsEnabledDesc: You'll receive pregnancy notifications as configured.
en.notificationsDisabledDesc: Please enable notifications in your device settings to receive alerts.
en.settingsUpdatedDesc: Your notification preferences have been saved.
en.newStartDescription: Clear all data and start fresh with pregnancy or period tracking
en.beFirstToShare: Be the first to share something with the community!
en.showMonthNumbersDesc: Display months as numbers (e.g. 5) instead of names (e.g. May)
en.congratulationsMessage: You've reached the end of your pregnancy journey with us. We hope this app helped you through these special 40 weeks!
en.postpartumMessage: Did you know you can continue using this app to track your menstrual cycle after birth? Many women's periods return 6-8 weeks postpartum (or later if breastfeeding).
en.postpartumInfoNote: You can always switch to period tracking mode later from Settings â†’ New Start
en.reportPostDescription: Why are you reporting this post?
en.reportSubmittedDescription: Thank you for helping keep our community safe.
en.confirmLogoutDescription: Are you sure you want to logout?
en.reportError: Failed to submit report. Please try again.
en.loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account
en.profilePicSize: Profile picture must be less than 2MB
en.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
en.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
en.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
en.deletePostConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
en.deleteReplyConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this reply?
en.noMessages: No messages yet. Start the conversation!
en.reportMessageDescription: Please select a reason for reporting this message.
en.messageSendError: Failed to send message. Please try again.
en.deleteMessageConfirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your message.
en.deleteAccountDescription: This will submit a request to delete your account and all your data. This action cannot be undone. We will process your request within 48 hours.
en.deleteAccountRequestSent: Your account deletion request has been submitted. We will process it within 48 hours.
en.repliedToConversation: replied to a conversation you participated in
en.noRepliesYet: No replies yet. Be the first to reply!
